title: LMPD investigating fatal shooting of child in Shawnee
content:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. (WHAS11) - LMPD has confirmed that they are currently investigating the death of a child in Louisville's Shawnee neighborhood.
The incident occurred in a home on the 400 block of N. 34th St. around 11:30 P.M. Saturday night.
Authorities say the investigation centers around the shooting death of a nine-year-old boy.
The child was transported to Kosair Children's Hospital, where he was pronounced dead.
Police say the case is being treated as a death investigation at this time, but homicide is also participating in the process.
Additional details surrounding the situation have not been given at this time.
